value.title: Image resuability | Drush Site-Install
value.description: Test 1: Built in file uploader

body.value:
Test 1: Built in file uploader

  1. In the DXPR Builder settings form open the Media Browser fieldset

  2. Select None

  3. Save the form

  4. Reload this page

  5. Add an image element

  6. Click the Select Image button

  7. Upload an image from your local storage

  8. Save the element settings form

  9. Check that the image loads in the page

Test 2: Lightning Media Browser

  1. In the DXPR Builder settings form open the Media Browser fieldset

  2. Select image_browser

  3. Save the form

  4. Reload this page

  5. Add an image element

  6. Click the Select Image button

  7. Click the Upload tab

  8. Upload an image from your local storage

  9. Enter a name

  10. Save the image upload form

  11. Save the element settings form

  12. Check that the loads in the page

  13. Edit the image element

  14. Click the Select Image button

  15. Choose a different image from the library

  16. Save the image selection form

  17. Save the element settings form

  18. Check that the first image is replaced with the newly chosen image
